citations.desc: ATTENDING VETERINARIAN AND ADEQUATE VETERINARY CARE (DEALERS AND EXHIBITORS).
citations.narrative:
At the pig facility, one pig, Jasper has very thickened skin on its rear legs, tail and face. There is hair loss on the
face and the facial folds appear swollen. This skin condition needs to be diagnosed and appropriate treatment
provided.
Since this pig is routinely sedated for procedures, diagnosis can be started then.
To be corrected by 5-30-14.
Exit briefing conducted with facility representative.

narrative:

ATTENDING VETERINARIAN AND ADEQUATE VETERINARY CARE (DEALERS AND EXHIBITORS).
At the pig facility, one pig, Jasper has very thickened skin on its rear legs, tail and face. There is hair loss on the
face and the facial folds appear swollen.    This skin condition needs to be diagnosed and appropriate treatment
provided.    
Since this pig is routinely sedated for procedures, diagnosis can be started then.
To be corrected by 5-30-14.        
Exit briefing conducted with facility representative.
